{!bfwd__BFSubscription__c.PublicProductName__c} Cancelation

As requested, your subscription has been canceled and your license will no longer work after the deactivation date. Please delete any copies of the software from your servers as per the terms of service.

Activated on: {!bfwd__BFSubscription__c.bfwd__InitialPeriodStart__c}
Deactivates on: {!bfwd__BFSubscription__c.bfwd__SubscriptionEnd__c}

You can edit your account information or view an invoice at any time by visiting: https://account.tectonic.com

Thank you,
The Tectonic Team
